charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1101_010:
One day, Malva called
[Name:PlayerNickname ] over for a chat...
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_020:
I’ve been wanting to have a nice, relaxed chat
with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_030:
You’re a hot shot who’s been quickly making a
name for yourself here on Pasio, after all.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_040:
But that's not the only reason I’ve taken an
interest in you...
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_050:
I chose Talonflame as my partner Pokémon so
we’d be able to watch goings-on in Pasio from
the sky—keeping an eye out for excitement.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_060:
And when I did catch wind of excitement, I found
that you were always at the center of it.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_070:
And that’s also why I’ve been keeping a close eye
on you.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_080:
One can’t talk about Pasio without your name
coming up, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_090: Haha! Now, now—no need to tense up!
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_100: I’m not here on official business or anything.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_110:
I just thought we could have a casual chat over
some coffee.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_120:
Anyways—I noticed you’ve been busy joining
forces with skilled Trainers from other regions.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_130:
And that’s making you quite famous here on
Pasio. There’s something so wonderful and
sensational about your success.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_140: But it seems to me you’re not satisfied...
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_150: I’m curious about what’s next for you.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_160: Tell me: what is it you want for the future?
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_0401_180: I see. What a wonderful goal.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_0302_190:
I want to deepen my bonds with
others.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_0402_200: I see. Very fitting to your way of thinking.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_210:
You may be aware, but I am a news reporter,
and also a member of the Kalos Elite Four.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_220:
As such, I will be reporting on your success,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_230:
And soon, word of it will spread amongst the
people of Kalos.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_240:
Once that happens, everyone will be paying
close attention to what you have to say.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_260:
My intuition told me that the fire I saw in your
eyes would spread all throughout Pasio.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_270:
I can’t say whether you do it consciously or not,
but you have unwavering beliefs, and you always
act based upon them.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_280: Always make sure you stay true to them.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_290:
Light a fire in your heart, and keep on moving
straight ahead!
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_0401_310: Very earnest of you. That’s the spirit.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_0302_320: Will you continue cheering me on?
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_0402_340:
I need you to become far stronger than you are
now.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_350:
I’m excited to see the how the fire in your heart
will heat things up, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_360:
I guarantee that I won't miss any excitement
you stir up on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0177_00_pachira/2301_1201_370:
No matter how far off we might be, Talonflame
and I will be watching.
